title: AVG Internet Security 2016 16.31.7356 + Serials
description:
Essential protection that won't get in your way! If you use your computer every day, you need protection that's always there, constantly keeping you safe. With AVG Anti-Virus, you get hassie-free protection against today's most sophisticcated threats, online and offline. AVG Anti-Virus includes ther unique LinkScanner to prevent you from accidentally visiting harmful websites. It's fasterr, smarter security that won't slow you down. AVG Anti-Virus is one of the most complete programs that you have find to date. It includes many new options to make it one of the most effective virus scanners on the market. It is still plagued by horrible slowdowns at times. Even things so simple as just typing an IM can be stopped for several seconds for some reason. If you can get passed the occasional slowdowns of your computer, the scanning functionallity of AVG Anti-Virus is top of the line. With the rewrite of the scanning engine, AVG includes multi-processor support. 



Changelog: (January 9, 2016) 



- Optimization of internal processes supporting cooperation with Windows 10. 

- Implemented minor setup arrangements and enhancements for smoother installation.

- Removal of boot accelerator notifications. 

- Fixed issue with threat accessibility in Virus Vault after AVG uninstall and re-install. 

- Optimization of language selection in the installation process. 

- New information added into the About dialog.




This torrent contains: 


- AVG Anti-Virus (Online Installation) 
- AVG Anti-Virus (Offline Installation) x86 
- AVG Anti-Virus (Offline Installation) x64
